remarks: Multiplication of both sides of 'less than or equal to' by a nonnegative number.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
statement:
ltp1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
divgt0d.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
lemul1ad.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
lemul1ad.4 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ C ) $.
lemul1ad.5 $e |- ( ph -> A <_ B ) $.
lemul1ad $p |- ( ph -> ( A x. C ) <_ ( B x. C ) ) $.
